00031 FileBlockCache::~FileBlockCache() {
00032   for (BlockMapT::iterator iter = m_block_map.begin(); iter != m_block_map.end(); iter++) {
00033     delete [] (*iter).second->block;
00034     delete (*iter).second;
00035   }
00036 }

00038 bool FileBlockCache::checkout(int fileId, uint32_t offset, uint8_t **blockp, uint32_t *lengthp) {
00039   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00040   CacheKeyT key;
00041   BlockMapT::iterator iter;
00042 
00043   key.fileId = fileId;
00044   key.offset = offset;
00045 
00046   if ((iter = m_block_map.find(key)) == m_block_map.end())
00047     return false;
00048 
00049   move_to_head((*iter).second);
00050 
00051   (*iter).second->refCount++;
00052 
00053   *blockp = (*iter).second->block;
00054   *lengthp = (*iter).second->length;
00055   return true;
00056 }

00059 void FileBlockCache::checkin(int fileId, uint32_t offset) {
00060   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00061   CacheKeyT key;
00062   BlockMapT::iterator iter;
00063 
00064   key.fileId = fileId;
00065   key.offset = offset;
00066 
00067   iter = m_block_map.find(key);
00068 
00069   assert(iter != m_block_map.end() && (*iter).second->refCount > 0);
00070 
00071   (*iter).second->refCount--;
00072 }

00075 bool FileBlockCache::insert_and_checkout(int fileId, uint32_t offset, uint8_t *block, uint32_t length) {
00076   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00077   CacheValueT *cacheValue = new CacheValueT;
00078   BlockMapT::iterator iter;
00079 
00080   cacheValue->key.fileId = fileId;
00081   cacheValue->key.offset = offset;
00082 
00083   if ((iter = m_block_map.find(cacheValue->key)) != m_block_map.end()) {
00084     move_to_head((*iter).second);
00085     delete cacheValue;
00086     return false;
00087   }
00088 
00089   cacheValue->block = block;
00090   cacheValue->length = length;
00091   cacheValue->refCount = 1;
00092 
00093   if (m_head == 0) {
00094     cacheValue->next = cacheValue->prev = 0;
00095     m_head = m_tail = cacheValue;
00096   }
00097   else {
00098     m_head->next = cacheValue;
00099     cacheValue->prev = m_head;
00100     cacheValue->next = 0;
00101     m_head = cacheValue;
00102   }
00103 
00104   m_block_map[cacheValue->key] = cacheValue;
00105   return true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 void FileBlockCache::move_to_head(CacheValueT *cacheValue) {
00110 
00111   if (m_head == cacheValue)
00112     return;
00113 
00114   cacheValue->next->prev = cacheValue->prev;
00115   if (cacheValue->prev == 0)
00116     m_tail = cacheValue->next;
00117   else
00118     cacheValue->prev->next = cacheValue->next;
00119 
00120   cacheValue->next = 0;
00121   m_head->next = cacheValue;
00122   cacheValue->prev = m_head;
00123   m_head = cacheValue;
00124 }
